links.description: End of Day Update: The S&P500 started Thursday with healthy gains, unwinding all of Wednesday's losses and then some. Unfortunately the buying didn't last and prices slipped back near breakeven by the close. This is the fifth day the 50dma has been a ceiling for stocks.

$AAPL Great summary of Saber Capital's 4Q17 Letter - long thesis for Apple:  https://investoralmanac.com/2018/02/18/saber-capital-4q17-letter-2017-review-apple-and-tencent/

links.title: Saber Capital 4Q17 Letter: 2017 Review, Apple, and Tencent - InvestorAlmanac
links.description: Saber Capital Management Letter to Investors: 2017 Review, February 15, 2018 In 2017, portfolio gained 30.7% gross (25.3% net) vs. S&P 500 gain of 21.8% 3 biggest drivers were Apple, Verisign, and Tencent; gained 46%, 50%, and 114% respectively in 2017 Selling Too Early It was a mistake to sell our bank basket (JPM and BAC).
